# Contributing

Thanks for helping improve Copilot Money CLI!

## Development setup

```bash
python3 -m venv .venv
source .venv/bin/activate
python3 -m pip install -e .
```

## Tests

```bash
python3 -m pytest
```

## Code style

- Format with `black .` if configured
- Lint with `ruff .` if configured

## Pull requests

- Keep PRs focused and small
- Add or update docs when behavior changes
- Run tests before submitting

## Issues

- Include OS version, Python version, and CLI command used
- Provide the exact error output and steps to reproduce
